name: Cruel Mistress
description: A being of nature's dark wit, Venuvians are no meagre foe. All hits inflict Poison I for 3 seconds, and Poison itself has no effect on a Venuvian. As well as this, being in sunlight, exposed to the sun, triggers advanced photosynthesis, causing wounds to close with Regeneration 1 and their bodies to be nourished with Saturation 1.
